Item ID1381

A staff of air is the basic air elemental staff. It provides unlimited amounts of air runes as well as the autocast option when equipped. All elemental staves offer the same Magic bonuses and only differ by the type of rune they supply and their Melee stats.

The staff can be purchased from various shops across Gielinor, including Zaff's Superior Staffs! in Varrock. It can also be bought on the Grand Exchange, obtained through other players, dropped by various enemies, or obtained as a reward from two medium tier clue scrolls.

Players with access to a crystal ball within a player-owned house may change the element of this staff.

[[File:Staff of air detail.png|left|110px]]
A '''staff of air''' is the basic air [[elemental staff]]. It provides unlimited amounts of [[Air rune|air runes]] as well as the [[autocast]] option when equipped. All elemental staves offer the same [[Magic]] bonuses and only differ by the type of [[runes|rune]] they supply and their [[Melee]] stats.

The staff can be purchased from various shops across [[Gielinor]], including [[Zaff's Superior Staffs!]] in [[Varrock]]. It can also be bought on the [[Grand Exchange]], obtained through other players, dropped by various enemies, or obtained as a reward from two [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium tier clue scrolls]].

Players with access to a [[crystal ball]] within a [[player-owned house]] may change the element of this staff.
